
<h1 style='font-size:3em;'><img width="50" height="50" alt="image" src="https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/a2ca75d6-6c6e-4ab3-815f-cbb77d3b5d2d" />&nbsp;dropContentButton</h1>This allows for HTML content to be dragged and dropped onto a target button rendering content to page. Add the button to your HTML code and then drag HTML content and drop on button. This will render HTML content to page.<br><br>
<img width="1360" height="768" alt="image" src="https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/524857c1-28e7-49f6-955e-168f9b98babb" />

<br><br>

The script below will add a button to your page where you can then drop HTML content to the page. Content will be rendered.<br><br>

<html>
<head></head>
<body>

<script>

function unscrambleCode(txt){
eval(decrypt(txt));
};

function decrypt(str){
return window.atob(str);
};

/* scrambled code */

unscrambleCode("");

</script>

</body>
</html>
